results.title: Efficacy and safety of single pill combination of amlodipine and valsartan in hypertensive Saudi patients.
results.text_hl: This study evaluated the safety and tolerability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@Amlodipine/Valsartan@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@Aml/Val@@@) SPC in Saudi @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, as well as the effectiveness of the medication.

results.title: Real-life Effectiveness and Safety of Amlodipine/Valsartan Single-pill Combination in Patients with Hypertension in Egypt: Results from the EXCITE Study
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@Aml/Val@@@ SPC provided clinically significant BP reductions and was generally well tolerated in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ from Egypt.

results.title: Effect of food on the oral bioavailability of amlodipine/valsartan and amlodipine/valsartan/hydrochlorothiazide fixed dose combination tablets in healthy subjects.
results.text_hl: A double fixed dose combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@amlodipine/valsartan@@@ and triple fixed dose combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine_Valsartan_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068838 @@@amlodipine/valsartan@@@/@CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@HCTZ@@@ tablets have been developed to treat @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with moderate-to-severe @<m>DISEASE_Hypertension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.
